sub_title: Entrepreneur in sustainable businesses in food, energy, materials and education
summary:
Serial sustainability entrepreneur (www.mgmc.nl ; www.milieubende.nl ; www.waka-waka.com ; www.wakawakafoundation.org ; www.kipster.nl ; www.ignitenow.nl ; www.wholygreens.com).

Experienced consultant on and hand-on performer of sustainability policy and communication strategy.

Writer and publisher, Writer, producer, director, editor  and presentator of radio and television documentary programmes.

Key note speaker, conference president, discussion leader in conferences etc.

Project coordinator of sustainabilty programmes of companies, governmental bodies and NGO's.

Specialties: Project initiation and leadership.

We're building the most animal-, environmental- and farmer friendly as well as the first carbon neutral poultry farm in the world. 

An important issue (wo)mankind faces is how to feed the growing world population in a fair way. Without fomenting animals, without overexploiting nature, without excluding people, while offering farmers a good way to earn a decent living and providing consumers with good and affordable agricultural products. 
The actual situation is that our low food price is paid for at a high price elsewhere, for example, by the animals, environment, farmers, and our children. 
But this doesn't have to be that way.
